example.description: This example updates a maintenance window with new tags. There is no output if the command succeeds. The syntax used by this example requires PowerShell version 3 or later.

example.code:
PS C:\> $tag1 = New-Object Amazon.SimpleSystemsManagement.Model.Tag PS C:\> $tag1.Key = "Stack" PS C:\> $tag1.Value = "Production"
PS C:\> Add-SSMResourceTag -ResourceId "mw-03eb9db42890fb82d" -ResourceType "MaintenanceWindow" -Tag $tag1
example.description: With PowerShell version 2, you must use New-Object to create each tag. There is no output if the command succeeds.
